name: Griffon Hoverwork Limited
goal: Sustainable excellence in research and development, design engineering, manufacture and through life support of hovercraft, air cushioned vehicles, marine and related innovative technologies.
interests: Business and Industry, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: The company is engaging with EU Institutions to present their innovative Fast Craft Air Cushion (FCAC) technology.  The subject matter will target the transportation of freight into difficult to reach areas of Europe, with potential for humanitarian transportation, humanitarian aid and crisis management, emergency preparedness and response, medical response, disaster relief and recovery.
